name: upwork
description:
More than year I used to work remotely for MarketWave. (http://www.market-wave.com/)
MarketWave is company who provide customer multi-channels management (Phone, Live Chat, etc).
Company provide sales support for visitors with key leaders of e-commerce.
They was my general clients.
responsibilities: Design, develop, test and deploy web applications
Develop appropriate code structures to solve specific tasks according to standards
Fix bugs, troubleshoot and resolve problems
Build flexible data models and seamless integration points
Comment code and write documentation using ApiDoc

name: qcoders
description:
During work in this company I had only one general project which was divided to few small subprojects.
InTouch http://intouch.inweb24.us/
InTouch is a email marketing system. Like MailChimp or Mandrill but with an emphasis in network marketing. I'm started this project from scratch. Gradually our team has grown up to 7 developers.
It was first experience with Node.js on commercial project.
responsibilities: Design and development of system architecture
Design and development of source code
